welcome:
üëã Hi! I'll help you find an AI subscription.

Just write or send a voice message ‚Äî I understand both formats. Describe what you need and I'll find the right tool for you.
welcome_back: Welcome back! How can I help? Write or send a voice message.
help:
üìö How to use the bot:

Just write or send voice messages ‚Äî I understand both formats.

Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/my_orders - Your purchase history
/wishlist - Saved products
/help - This message

Or just describe what you need, and I'll help you find the perfect subscription!

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Get in touch with us
contacts.supportDescription: Write to our AI assistant in the Telegram bot ‚Äî it will answer all your questions
contacts.contactHint: Chat directly with our AI assistant

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Money-back guarantee
refund.conditionsText:
Refunds are available in the following cases:

‚Ä¢ Product was not delivered within 48 hours after payment
‚Ä¢ Product does not match the description
‚Ä¢ Technical issues that we could not resolve within 72 hours
‚Ä¢ Order cancellation before product delivery
refund.procedureText:
To request a refund:

1. Contact support via bot or email
2. Provide order number and reason for refund
3. We will review your request within 24 hours
4. Upon approval, funds will be returned to the same payment method within 3-5 business days
refund.timingText:
‚Ä¢ Request review: up to 24 hours
‚Ä¢ Refund processing: 3-5 business days
‚Ä¢ For cryptocurrency payments: up to 7 business days
refund.contactText: If you have questions about refunds, contact our support

paymentInfo.title: Payment Information
paymentInfo.subtitle: Payment methods and process
paymentInfo.methodsText:
We accept the following payment methods:

‚Ä¢ Bank cards (Visa, Mastercard, MIR)
‚Ä¢ Fast Payment System (FPS)
‚Ä¢ Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, USDT, Ethereum)

All payments are processed through the secure CardLink payment gateway.
paymentInfo.processText:
1. Select a product and click "Pay"
2. You will be redirected to the payment page
3. Enter card details or choose another method
4. After successful payment, the product will be delivered automatically
5. You will receive a notification in Telegram with access credentials
paymentInfo.securityText:
All payments are protected:

‚Ä¢ Data encryption according to PCI DSS standard
‚Ä¢ Two-factor authentication
‚Ä¢ Fraud protection
‚Ä¢ We do not store your card data
paymentInfo.questionsText: If you have payment issues, contact support

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Service usage conditions
terms.acceptanceText: By using our service, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree with any of the terms, please do not use the service.
terms.servicesText:
We provide access to digital subscriptions and AI services:

‚Ä¢ Sale of digital goods (subscriptions, API keys)
‚Ä¢ Electronic delivery of goods
‚Ä¢ Customer support via Telegram bot
‚Ä¢ Referral program
terms.obligationsText:
We commit to:

‚Ä¢ Provide quality services
‚Ä¢ Ensure payment security
‚Ä¢ Protect personal data
‚Ä¢ Provide customer support

You commit to:

‚Ä¢ Use services in accordance with their purpose
‚Ä¢ Not transfer access to third parties
‚Ä¢ Comply with terms of use
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to change the terms of use. Changes take effect upon publication. By continuing to use the service, you agree to the new terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Personal data processing
privacy.collectionText:
We collect the following data:

‚Ä¢ Telegram ID and username
‚Ä¢ Order and purchase history
‚Ä¢ Contact information (if provided)
‚Ä¢ Technical data (IP address, device type)

We DO NOT collect:
‚Ä¢ Bank card data
‚Ä¢ Passwords
‚Ä¢ Confidential information
privacy.usageText:
Your data is used for:

‚Ä¢ Processing orders and delivering goods
‚Ä¢ Contacting you regarding orders
‚Ä¢ Improving service quality
‚Ä¢ Providing support
‚Ä¢ Analyzing service usage (anonymously)
privacy.protectionText:
We apply the following security measures:

‚Ä¢ Data encryption during transmission
‚Ä¢ Secure storage in protected databases
‚Ä¢ Limited access to personal data
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits
privacy.rightsText:
You have the right to:

‚Ä¢ Request a copy of your data
‚Ä¢ Request data deletion
‚Ä¢ Withdraw consent for processing
‚Ä¢ Correct inaccurate data
‚Ä¢ File a complaint with a supervisory authority
privacy.contactText: For questions about personal data processing, contact:
